醧字的基本解释

醧
yù
古指在家庭举行私宴。
酒美。
能者饮，不能者停饮。

醧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》依据切，去御，影。］
宴饮。

醧字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醧； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1287第06
【唐韻】【集韻】?依據切，音?。【說文】私燕飮也。【玉篇】私也。【左思·魏都賦】愔愔醧讌，酣湑無譁。【註】韓詩云：賔爾籩豆，飮酒之醧。能者飮，不能者已謂之醧。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?烏侯切，音謳。義同。　又【集韻】於侯切，音漚。酒味和。

醧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
醧字的起名意思

暂无。

醧
Basic explanation of words
醧
yù
The ancient refers to holding private banquets in the family.
Good wine.
Those who are able to drink, stop drinking for those who cannot.
醧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" is based on cutting, going to imperial, and shadowing. ]
feast.
醧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醧; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1287 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? According to cut, sound?. 【Said the text】Private Yan Sang also. 【Jade articles】Private too. 【Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu】Stunned and stunned, without a whistle. [Note] Han Shiyun: Bladder yong bean, the glutinous rice wine. Those who are capable are savage, and those who are unable are called 醧.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wuhou cut, sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Yu Houqie, sound reunion. Wine taste and.
